fieldUpdates.description: Dynamically sets Priority Number based on various Case attributes History - Gunith (8-7-19): eParcel- Regular email fields should set 7 (REQ1817207)
fieldUpdates.formula:
IF(
Account.IsVIP__c, 10,
IF(ISPICKVAL(Origin,'Snap It'), 7,
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Origin, 'Email'), ISPICKVAL(ProductSubCategory__c, 'eParcel- Regular'), ISPICKVAL(EnquirySubType__c, 'Facility Reported Damages')), 7,
IF(AND (Customer_Type__c ="Consumer" || Customer_Type__c ="Silver" || Customer_Type__c = "MyPost Business", ISPICKVAL(Priority,'Low')),1,
(IF( AND (Customer_Type__c ="Consumer" || Customer_Type__c ="Silver" || Customer_Type__c = "MyPost Business", ISPICKVAL(Priority,'Medium')), 2,
(IF( AND (Customer_Type__c ="Consumer" || Customer_Type__c ="Silver" || Customer_Type__c = "MyPost Business", ISPICKVAL(Priority,'High')), 3,
(IF( AND (Customer_Type__c ="SMB" || Customer_Type__c ="Gold", ISPICKVAL(Priority,'Low')), 4,
(IF( AND (Customer_Type__c ="SMB" || Customer_Type__c ="Gold", ISPICKVAL(Priority,'Medium')), 5,
(IF( AND (Customer_Type__c ="SMB" || Customer_Type__c ="Gold", ISPICKVAL(Priority,'High')), 6,
(IF( AND (Customer_Type__c ="Enterprise" || Customer_Type__c ="Platinum", ISPICKVAL(Priority,'Low')), 7,
(IF( AND (Customer_Type__c ="Enterprise" || Customer_Type__c ="Platinum", ISPICKVAL(Priority,'Medium')), 8,
(IF( AND (Customer_Type__c ="Enterprise" || Customer_Type__c ="Platinum", ISPICKVAL(Priority,'High')), 9,
5
))))))))))))))))))))
fieldUpdates.name: SSSW - Set Priority Number

fieldUpdates.description: History - Gunith REQ2122521: Support Customer Care Escalation
fieldUpdates.formula:
IF(ISPICKVAL(EnquirySubType__c, 'Customer Care Escalation'), 100,
IF(ISPICKVAL(ProductSubCategory__c, 'Premium Unaddressed Mail'), 70,
IF(Account.IsVIP__c, 100, IF( ISPICKVAL(Priority,'High'), 90,
IF(AND (Customer_Type__c ="Enterprise" || Customer_Type__c ="Platinum", ISPICKVAL(Status,'Customer Responded')), 10,
IF(ISPICKVAL(EnquirySubType__c,"Facility Reported Damages"), 70,
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Origin, 'Email'), ISPICKVAL(ProductSubCategory__c, 'eParcel- Regular'), ISPICKVAL(EnquirySubType__c, 'Facility Reported Damages')), 70,
IF(ISPICKVAL(Origin, 'Social Business'), 85,
IF(ISPICKVAL(Origin,'Fax'), 100,
IF(ISPICKVAL(Origin, 'Internal form'), 70,
IF (ISPICKVAL(Origin, 'AP Retail (PM26)'), 70,
IF(ISPICKVAL(Origin,'Snap It'), 60,
IF(AND (Customer_Type__c ="Enterprise" || Customer_Type__c ="Platinum", ISPICKVAL(Status,'Network Responded')), 10,
IF(Customer_Type__c ="Enterprise" || Customer_Type__c ="Platinum", 10,
(IF( AND (Customer_Type__c ="SMB" || Customer_Type__c ="Gold", ISPICKVAL(Status,'Customer Responded')), 10,
(IF( AND (Customer_Type__c ="SMB" || Customer_Type__c ="Gold", ISPICKVAL(Status,'Network Responded')), 10,
IF(Customer_Type__c ="SMB" || Customer_Type__c ="Gold", 10,
IF(ISPICKVAL(Origin, 'Social'), 40,
(IF(AND (Customer_Type__c ="Consumer" || Customer_Type__c ="Silver" || Customer_Type__c = "MyPost Business", ISPICKVAL(Status,'Customer Responded')), 10,
(IF(AND (Customer_Type__c ="Consumer" || Customer_Type__c ="Silver" || Customer_Type__c = "MyPost Business", ISPICKVAL(Status,'Network Responded')), 10,
(IF(AND (Customer_Type__c ="Consumer" || Customer_Type__c ="Silver" || Customer_Type__c = "MyPost Business", NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status,'Customer Responded'))),10,10
))))))))))))))))))))))))))
fieldUpdates.name: SSSW - Set Priority Number NCCC

rules.fullName: BGS Update Case Status at creation
rules.description: BGS - When a case is created manually, its status should be in progress.

rules.fullName: BGS Update Status On Case Accept
rules.description: BGS - for service delivery cases. if case is accepted manually, change case status from New to In Progress
rules.formula: AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Sales_Ops_Delivery', TEXT(Status) = 'New', ischanged(OwnerId), BEGINS( priorvalue(OwnerId), '00G'), !isblank(Owner:User.Id) )

criteriaItems.value: Reclaim Funds Success Notification,All Cashout Success Notification

rules.description: Card Transaction Monitoring recrody type - I2C Email to case is set to Close as this is a notification only. Subject line of the email equal " All Cashout Success Notification & Reclaim Funds Success Notification" from email address support.mcp@i2cinc.c
When the case is created by an email, certain case fields are updated
Close Sales Implementation Case if stage is closed
Close case when all credit approvals have been approved

rules.fullName: Customer Data Team - update owner to queue
E2C Business Unit Update For StarTrack
rules.description: Business Unit update For Email To Case for StarTrack

rules.fullName: MPBHSP - Mypost Business Portal to MPB Inbound
rules.description: Assign new Cases created from Mypost Business portal / community to the SSSW MyPost Business Inbound, SLA -Enterprise
Closes all milestones related to Retail Fulfillment & Support cases when the case is closed
Defaults the Retail Fulfillment SLA on all new cases created with the Retail Fulfillment & Support Record Type
Set Case to close automatically once the agent has saved the case. Based on Type: RETURNS / Problem Type: Damaged/Faulty or Excess/Duplicate Order Warehouse: 0200, 0350, 0600, 0990
Business Sales Implementation, remove escalation trigger
rules.formula: AND(RecordType.Name = 'Business Sales Implementation', IsEscalated = TRUE, Owner_is_Queue__c = FALSE, ISCHANGED(OwnerId))

rules.fullName: SSSW - Allocate to Queue when there is a change of Origin
rules.description: Used to allocate case to Queue based on SSSW routing if case.origin changes to 'Social'
rules.formula: AND(NOT(IsHLC__c),NOT(IsCR__c), OR(CONTAINS(Case_RecordType_Name__c, 'SSSW'),(Case_RecordType_Name__c = 'Social Record Type')), NOT(ISNEW()), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Origin,'Fax')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Origin,'White mail')), ISCHANGED(Origin ))

rules.fullName: SSSW - Clear NPS Data for Child Cases

rules.description: The System Status is used in the Queue Management process for SSSW. This will clear any System Status fields when the main Case Status changes
REQ0998943 - Automatically set the resolution result to Closed by customer when a case is closed via portal or web
rules.formula: AND( IsClosed, CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, "SSSW"), OR( LastModifiedBy.Profile.Name == 'Mypost Business Help & Support Community User', LastModifiedBy.Profile.Name == 'BSP Community User', LastModifiedBy.Profile.Name == 'DDC Consumer Community User', LastModifiedBy.Profile.Name == 'Merchant Portal Community User', ISPICKVAL(Origin, "BSP Bulk Upload") ) )

rules.fullName: SSSW - Consumer Portal Route MyPost Digital Mailbox
rules.description: When a consumer 'Select a product or service *' via the portal this will route the case to a queue

rules.fullName: SSSW - Consumer Portal Route to Business Inbound
rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 And 6 AND 7 AND 8

rules.fullName: SSSW - Consumer Portal Route to Consumer Inbound
rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND (4 OR 5) AND 6 AND 7

criteriaItems.value: Article carded - no card left,Article carded - no delivery attempt,Article safe dropped - no delivery attempt,Article safe dropped - not located,Article safe dropped unsafe location,Disputed delivery,Unauthorised MRS application

rules.description: SSSW Consumer Inbound Delivery Support

rules.description: When a consumer 'Select a product or service *' via the portal this will route the case to a queue

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5) AND 6 AND 7 AND 8

criteriaItems.value: Delivery Choices,eParcel Online,Farmhouse Direct,Mobile website,MyAccount,Other Web & Apps,Parcel Collect,Postcard App,shop.auspost.com.au,stationery.auspost.com.au,Video Stamp,Website
All Other ID&V services,Amex,ID check - ATO TFN,ID check - other,ID check - Working with children,KeyPass,MRS Online,My Post ID card,Parcel Send App,Passport - Australian,Passport - British
Car Insurance,Foreign Currency,Money Orders,Multi-Currency Cash Passport,Other Financial Services,Other Insurance,PostBillPay,Superannuation,Travel Insurance,Western Union

rules.formula: ( ISNEW() && ISBLANK(Subject) ) || ( NOT(ISNEW()) && ( ISCHANGED( ProductCategory__c ) || ISCHANGED( ProductSubCategory__c ) ) ) && CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName,'SSSW') && (NOT (ISPICKVAL( Origin , "Email") || ISPICKVAL( Origin , "Portal")|| ISPICKVAL( Origin , "Fax")|| ISPICKVAL( Origin , "Social")|| ISPICKVAL( Origin , "High Level Complaints")))

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND ((9 AND 10) OR 11)

criteriaItems.value: Item transfer,Missing Item,Disputed delivery scan,Tracking,Delivery complaint,Inbound tracking,Outbound tracking,Delayed delivery,Delivery request

rules.description: Update for INC2147403 : Added condition for Case Origin

rules.fullName: SSSW - Email Awaiting Collection %5BContact without Email%5D
SSSW - Email Awaiting Collection %5BContact without Email%5D %28Allocate To Queue%29
rules.formula: AND((((Article_Event_Codes__c = 'DD-ER4') || (Article_Event_Codes__c = 'NT-ER4') || (Article_Event_Codes__c = 'TTP-ER4') ) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Closed')) && ISBLANK(Contact.Email) && TEXT(ProductCategory__c) != '' && TEXT(ProductSubCategory__c) != '' && TEXT(EnquirySubType__c) != '' && TEXT(Type) != ''),OR(CONTAINS(Case_RecordType_Name__c, 'SSSW'),(Case_RecordType_Name__c = 'Social Record Type')),OR(ISCHANGED(Article_Event_Codes__c), ISCHANGED(ProductCategory__c), ISCHANGED(ProductSubCategory__c), ISCHANGED(EnquirySubType__c), ISCHANGED(Type),ISCHANGED(Status)))

rules.fullName: SSSW - Email Awaiting Collection %5BContact without Email%5D HLC
rules.formula: AND(((Article_Event_Codes__c = 'DD-ER4') || (Article_Event_Codes__c = 'NT-ER4') || (Article_Event_Codes__c = 'TTP-ER4') ), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Closed')), ISBLANK(Contact.Email), NOT(IsCR__c), NOT(IsHLC__c), OR(CONTAINS(Case_RecordType_Name__c, 'SSSW'),(Case_RecordType_Name__c = 'Social Record Type')),OR(ISCHANGED(Article_Event_Codes__c), ISCHANGED(Status), ISCHANGED(IsCR__c), ISCHANGED(IsHLC__c)))

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND ((9 AND 10) OR 11)

criteriaItems.value: Item transfer,Missing Item,Inbound tracking,Disputed delivery scan,Tracking,Delivery complaint,Outbound tracking,Delayed delivery,Delivery request

rules.description: Update for INC2147403 : Added condition for Case Origin

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND ((9 AND 10) OR 11)

criteriaItems.value: Item transfer,Missing Item,Inbound tracking,Disputed delivery scan,Tracking,Delivery complaint,Outbound tracking,Delayed delivery,Delivery request

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND ((9 AND 10) OR 11)

criteriaItems.value: Item transfer,Missing Item,Disputed delivery scan,Tracking,Delivery complaint,Inbound tracking,Outbound tracking,Delayed delivery,Delivery request

rules.description: Update for INC2147403 : Added condition for Case Origin

rules.fullName: SSSW - Ensure Contact method is set
SSSW - Feedback to Close on Awaiting Network

rules.description: Sets the last assigned queue and ID
Populates LastStatusUpdate with Date/Time
SSSW - Resets the Network Milestones when the Network is changed, but the Status remains the same.
rules.formula: BEGINS(RecordType.DeveloperName,'SSSW') && ( NOT(ISCHANGED(Status)) && ISPICKVAL(Status,'Awaiting Network Response') ) && ISCHANGED(Network__c) && CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, "SSSW")

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8

criteriaItems.value: Item transfer,Missing Item,Disputed delivery scan,Tracking,Delivery complaint,Inbound tracking,Outbound tracking,Delayed delivery,Delivery request

rules.description: SSSW - Onboard with driver international
allocates to queue if manually changed to customer responded History - Gunith (28/06/19) - Remove ServiceNow restriction (REQ1850268)

rules.formula: AND(ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Network Responded'), NOT(IsHLC__c), NOT(IsCR__c), OR(CONTAINS(Case_RecordType_Name__c, 'SSSW'),(Case_RecordType_Name__c = 'Social Record Type')),OR(ISCHANGED(Status), ISCHANGED(IsHLC__c), ISCHANGED(IsCR__c)))

rules.fullName: SSSW - Q - System Status - Tracking Update
rules.description: This will fire the Queue Allocation if a System Update is received for: Tracking Update. Temp Fix: To exclude HeldtoOpen cases where in some eventmessagecode belonging to SSSWNonRoutingEventCodes__c can set the SystemUpdate__c on the case record
rules.formula: AND(ISPICKVAL(SystemUpdate__c ,'Tracking Update'), OR(CONTAINS(Case_RecordType_Name__c, 'SSSW'),(Case_RecordType_Name__c = 'Social Record Type')), NOT(IsCR__c), NOT(IsHLC__c), IsBlank(ParentId), OR(ISCHANGED(SystemUpdate__c), ISCHANGED(IsCR__c), ISCHANGED(IsHLC__c), ISCHANGED(ParentId)),NOT( ISPICKVAL( Status ,'Awating Customer Response')),IF(ISBLANK(HeldToOpenOn__c),TRUE,NOT(CONTAINS($Setup.SSSWNonRoutingEventCodes__c.Codes__c, Article_Event_Codes__c ))))

rules.description: This will fire the Queue Allocation if a System Update is received as : -Child Case Update -Customer Comment -Customer Email -Network Email
rules.formula: AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(SystemUpdate__c ,'Child Case Update'), ISPICKVAL(SystemUpdate__c ,'Customer Comment'), ISPICKVAL(SystemUpdate__c ,'Customer Email'), ISPICKVAL(SystemUpdate__c ,'Network Email')), OR(CONTAINS(Case_RecordType_Name__c, 'SSSW'),(Case_RecordType_Name__c = 'Social Record Type')), NOT(IsCR__c), NOT(IsHLC__c), OR(ISCHANGED(SystemUpdate__c), ISCHANGED(IsCR__c), ISCHANGED(IsHLC__c)))

rules.description: Queue Priority
Sets the Delivery RT for specified Products
Sets case RT to General Enquiry if Case Type is 'General Enquiry'

criteriaItems.value: Post Office & Business Hub Services,Travel & ID,Money & Insurance,Web & Apps

rules.description: Sets the Rt to Service if specified Products are selected
Cloned "SSSW - Reopen Queue Allocation" WF in order to remove the time based actions
Clear Customer Milestones when the status is changed and Customer has violations.
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(Status) && NOT(ISNULL( Customer_Milestones_Violated__c)) && TEXT(Status) <> $Setup.QM__c.Customer_Status__c && CONTAINS( RecordType.DeveloperName, "SSSW")

rules.description: Clear Internal Milestones when the status is changed and Internal violations exist.
Clear Facility Milestones when the status is changed from Awaiting Facility Response.

rules.formula: Send_Case_Comments__c == true && (ISBLANK(ParentId)|| Customer_Type__c <> 'Enterprise') && CONTAINS(RecordType.Name,'SSSW') && (CONTAINS($Profile.Name,'SSSW') || $Profile.Name == 'System Administrator' || CONTAINS( $User.Username ,'apintegrationuser@auspost.com.au' ))

rules.description: This Captures the Previous Milestone of the Entitlement Process, so it can be used to restart the process at the Previous Tier when needed.
rules.formula: ( ISCHANGED( Internal_Milestones_Violated__c ) || ISCHANGED( Customer_Milestones_Violated__c ) || ISCHANGED( Facility_Milestones_Violated__c ) ) && ( NOT(ISBLANK(Internal_Milestones_Violated__c)) || NOT(ISBLANK(Customer_Milestones_Violated__c)) || NOT(ISBLANK(Facility_Milestones_Violated__c)) )

rules.fullName: SSSW - Set status Closed - Network Responded on MyNetwork reply
rules.description: When a MyNetwork updates the case, it will transfer back to the contact centre. This updates the status on a feedback case to "Closed"
rules.formula: CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, "SSSW") && ISPICKVAL( Type , "Feedback") && (CONTAINS( $Profile.Name , "SSSW - MyNetwork") || CONTAINS( $Profile.Name , "Hub Users"))

rules.fullName: SSSW - Set status Closed - Network Responded on PON reply
rules.description: When a PON users updates the case, it will transfer back to the contact centre. This updates the status on a feedback case to "Closed"
Initiates the Customer Tier Process of the SSSW Entitlement Process.

rules.formula: AND( NOT(IsNetworkResponseFromUI__c), TEXT(Status) == 'Awaiting Network Response' && CONTAINS(RecordType.Name,'SSSW') && TEXT(Network__r.Contact_Facility__c )<>'ServiceNow', NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Feedback")))

criteriaItems.value: SSSW Delivery,SSSW Fax,SSSW General Enquiry,SSSW Service,Social Record Type

rules.fullName: SSSW - Update Account on Contact Change

rules.description: Captures Cases where Owner's User Profile is 'SSSW - Service Agent' or Owner Queue is 'SSSWNetworkQueue' or case was held within EDD

criteriaItems.value: SSSW Delivery,SSSW Fax,SSSW General Enquiry,SSSW Service,Social Record Type

rules.description: Calls Update_Priority_to_High field update if Escalated is checked and Priority is not Critical or Urgent

rules.formula: StarTrack_RecordType__c && ISPICKVAL(Call_Purpose__c , 'Depot Created') && ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Waiting on operations') && OwnerId <> $Setup.StarTrack_Settings__c.SWMYTempQueue__c

rules.fullName: Untick Checkbox field on case create

criteriaItems.value: SSSW Delivery,SSSW Fax,SSSW General Enquiry,SSSW Service

rules.description: Checkbox__c used to know if case is printed for MyNetwork, untick it for cloned cases(newly created cases)
used by CoE case
Used for CoE Case

tasks.description: An automatic email response email has been sent to the customer who had requested an update for this Closed Case.
tasks.subject: Bounce Email Sent to Customer
